headerDescription: Escape to paradise at our exclusive 3-villa retreat in Corfu. Unlike a crowded resort, here you'll find privacy and personalized luxury. Our villas are havens of comfort, boasting all the essential indulgences without unnecessary extravagance. Imagine lush gardens surrounding your private sanctuary, and interiors designed with a touch of personality. It won't feel like a hotel room, but rather a luxurious home away from home, perfect for unwinding and creating lasting memories.
subtitle: Our Villas
